Text: Thanks a lot man. Much appreciated :)

thanks pristine.  i have been a huge fan of team YIFY for a while now.  however they are starting to venture into larger file sizes.  while i appreciate them for striving for better quality, it was their small sizes that made them attractive.  im hoping that you pack as much quality as yify did in these small sizes.  cheers.
Totally agree with 'heyyouguys'. Just keep up the good work :)
